argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tkgeom.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | tkgeom.d | |- .- = ( dist ` G ) |
| 3 |  | tkgeom.i | |- I = ( Itv ` G ) |
| 4 |  | tkgeom.g | |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 5 |  | tgbtwntriv2.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. P ) |
| 6 |  | tgbtwntriv2.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. P ) |
| 7 |  | tgbtwncomb.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. P ) |
| 8 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( A I C ) ) -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 9 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( A I C ) ) -> A e. P ) |
| 10 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( A I C ) ) -> B e. P ) |
| 11 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( A I C ) ) -> C e. P ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( A I C ) ) -> B e. ( A I C ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12 | #P_tgbtwncom | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( A I C ) ) -> B e. ( C I A ) ) |
| 14 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 15 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> C e. P ) |
| 16 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> B e. P ) |
| 17 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> A e. P ) |
| 18 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> B e. ( C I A ) ) |
| 19 | 1, 2, 3, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18 | #P_tgbtwncom | |- ( ( ph /\ B e. ( C I A ) ) -> B e. ( A I C ) ) |
| 20 | 13, 19 | #P_impbida | |- ( ph -> ( B e. ( A I C ) <-> B e. ( C I A ) ) ) |
